description.en:
Fedora Gold FED coin is a CryptoNote based privacy coin backed by a strong project team with a growing community of active users.  The Fedora network is secure and extremely fast (transactions resolve under 5 seconds). Our vision is to build a privacy based coin solution that works on any standard mobile device.

Our use cases are: 
 - Instant & private transactions
 - Usable by anyone, anywhere
 - Social interaction and commerce
